question: What is a Doubtful Asset?
option1: sub-standard asset for a period of 12 months
option2: sub-standard asset for a period of 3 months
option3: sub-standard asset for a period of 6 months
answer: sub-standard asset for a period of 12 months
explanation: If sub-standard asset remains so for a period of 12 more months; it would be termed as “Doubtful asset”. This remains so till end of 3rd year.
